title: Honor
overview: Martin Romero is an upright and reputable judge whose life changes completely when his son Alex commits a hit-and-run. The victim is a member of a mafia family and Romero is aware that if Alex's guilt becomes known, he will be sentenced one way or another. He will then begin a risky plan to protect him, which will put all his moral and professional convictions to the test in order to save his son.
